resources.string:
Guidelines:
1) Double tap to start/pause.
2) Swipe the screen up, down, left, and right to control the snake to turn.
3) Out of bounds (will not hit the left and right borders, but will hit the upper and lower borders), hit an obstacle and die or hit the snake itself, eat ordinary food will add one point and lengthen by one unit length, eat special food Three points will be added and one unit length will be subtracted.
4) In the single-player mode, the player controls a snake to eat as much food as possible. In the man-machine battle, the player controls the snake to compete with the AI snake. The player snake and the AI snake will not collide.
